messages.name: amiamyberlin
messages.content:
@marinadino and I washed the garbage bags full of bedsheets labeled "dirty" "to wash" in my basement. 

They turned out to be a lot of this. We also found some fitted sheets & fleece blankets, which we will take to the next kiezburn. 

I think we collected sheets for kiezburn 2023, so all these sheets were donated by harlots. 

All of these duvet covers and pillowcases aren't really useful for the harlot playspace, so I'd prefer if people come get them, or I will donate them around 15.01. 

Here are pictures. I wasn't able to take pictures of everything, so if you're missing sheets or blankets, let me know. I'll look around.

messages.name: Ikztuarapas
messages.content: Thank you for washing 💪♥️

messages.name: sooolla
messages.content: Thank you both 🥰

messages.name: Anta901
messages.content:
🔥 🔥 Saunacious Spa Sauna Fundraiser  🔥🏠  04.01.2025 🔥 🔥 

Let's sweat out all those NYE shanigans and get warm and cosy before reality hits again 😜 🦥

Saunacious Spa is hosting an all day Sauna Event and you are warmly invited ❤️‍🔥

Bring:
your cup 🍵 
your towel, bathrobe , flipflops 🩴
and your friends 🧚‍♀🧚🏿‍♂

When?
Saturday 04.01.2024
13:00 to 23:00  🕙

Where?
The 90° sauna space at 90mil. At Michaelbrücke 1, through the black gate ⛩

What?
👉 2 saunas (Plattenbau, Deine Mudda) 🧖‍♂️🧖‍♀️
👉 Drinks 🍸 
👉 Showers 🚿
👉 Fire barrel 🔥
👉 Dipping pool 🛀
👉 Chill music 😎

How much?
Please be ready to make a donation as this is a fundraiser event for our Kiezburn Camp 2025. 🌟🦄 💵 💵 

Usually we recommend:
🪙 Donation for sauna: €5-15
🪙 Donation for drinks
🪙 onetime €5 for the 90mil membership ( ➡️ 🦄 start the year right and get an annual pass to enjoy allt those fabulous events at 90mil 🤩 )

messages.name: AlexPooPip
messages.content:
reminder for Thursday‘s Burner Sauna at StudioDB

We cannot wait to have you back. As always: Sauna is heated up from 6 p.m. on - we will be there a bit earlier, so just come after work. 
We will have an agro yoga session, awesome DJs, massages and "Wichtelympics". Bring a funny, trashy present for approx. 5 Euros and take part in an immense fun. We will gamble until everyone got a present. Please don't bring things that are actually waste ;)

Admission is 15 Euros to cover costs.

messages.name: eefan
messages.content:
Wrap up 2024 and prepare for 2025✨
  
Let’s take a moment together to reflect on the year we’ve had and set intentions for what’s ahead. 

No prep needed—just show up however you’re feeling that day. Grab some snacks, a cup of tea, and maybe some pen and paper for writing down thoughts. 

We’ll do some simple exercises to look back on the highlights and challenges of 2024 and start imagining what 2025 could look like. 
And, of course, it’s always special to share some time together. 

 Looking forward to seeing you there!  

Pleun

---

Free online workshop today from 17:00-18.30h. Can be for your business or for you personally. If you’re interested send me a dm and I’ll add you to the list!(:

messages.name: marisoke
messages.content:
Room free in Schillerkiez, super close to Tempelhofer Feld from 22nd January until 29th of March! 🏡
The room comes with one female flatmate and my dog which stays with her for the first 3 weeks before moving to a friends place. So it would be awesome if you’d like dogs 🥰🐶
We have a big living room, a cute&cozy kitchen and a bath with bathtub which is extra nice during the colder seasons 🛀
People who share interest in alternative medicine are extra welcome 💛

If you’re interested just send me a DM and we can talk about the price ✨

messages.name: robertfoss
messages.content:
I'm away on a trip, and am looking for someone to stay in my apartment and water the plants.

It's a top floor apartment with three rooms; livingroom/kitchen, bedroom and an office. It's spacious, has a balcony and a big-ass bath tub.

Couples are fine, no pets. 

Location: Fhain, by Warschauer. 
Available: 15 Jan - 30 Jan
Price: 500Eur
Deposit: 1000Eur

If you're interested, send me a DM.

messages.name: joejung
messages.content:
The next dedicated group is gathering!!! 

The Mastermind Circle is a powerful & often near magical social technology to support a group of dedicated humans, passionate movers & shakers & actionfriendly dreamers in achieving their goals, dreams & purpose

The likemindedness of a circle turning wishes into reality is a great adventure to be had. Apply for the next round & see you at the MasterMind(/heart/soul)Circle soon. 

We will start our next 6 months journey with the first in person meeting 28.1.2025 | 19:30 in Berlin/StadtMitte

Growing our missions in a passionate group of inspired, benevolent leaders & visionaries

https://urbanjoy.de/mastermind

Best wishes, Paul & Joe 

P.s. If you are interested in this Format & want to join at the next occasion PM to @JoeJung

Ihr Lieben 
Let's play!!

• 19.12. | 19:00-20:30+ | Authentic Relating Games Night über den Dächern der Stadt 🧸🎁🎯 💝

Für 90 Minuten+ werden wir uns bewusst & spielerisch der Verbindung mit uns selbst und anderen widmen

Unity Dome
Charlottenstr. 63
10117 Berlin

Warum lieben wir ARGs so sehr❓️
Weil sie Tiefe & Leichtigkeit verbinden❗️ 
urbanjoy.de/authentic

Mit entspannender & achtsamer Zuwendung in Einzel- und Gruppenübungen dürfen wir Verbundenheit, Nähe & Distanz, Erholung, Liebesenergie und vielleicht wo nötig/möglich Heilsame Momente erfahren.

✨️ Vertiefe Deine Beziehung zu Dir selbst & anderen

✨️ Genieße fühlendes Sein & Handeln 
✨️ Erweitere Deine Fähigkeit, emotional präsent und berührbar zu sein
✨️ Fühl Dich noch mehr Zuhause & geborgen in Dir & mit (neuen) Freunden

messages.name: ecstaticdanceberlin
messages.content:
💞THURSDAY: ECSTATIC DANCE | YARUN DEE | 19 DEC  | 18:30 | FMP1 

🎶 Yarun Dee's diverse DJ sets draw from a wide range of influences, weaving together cosmic, sensual, celebratory, and heart-opening sounds and tribal beats  (20-22:00).

✅ CHECK FACEBOOK EVENT
👉 GET YOUR TICKET
🎧 LISTEN TO YARUN DEE

📍 LOCATION: FMP1, Franz-Mehring-Platz, 10243 Berlin

💃🏽  MOVEMENT WARM-UP (19-19:50): Julia Javkin

During the warm-up, we’ll explore each body’s unique language through movement, aiming to release what’s stored within and reconnect with life’s lightness. ✨ Together, we’ll let go of rigidity, embrace playfulness, and delve into self-exploration. 🌈 

🎸 SOUND HEALING (22-22:20h): Naftali

Naftali, a hypnotherapist, space holder, musician, and DJ, creates profound connections through the world of music and movement, leading to healing 🌟. Known for his beautiful handpan melodies 🎶, his music is a journey in itself 🙏. Enjoy!

🐾 FOLLOW ECSTATIC DANCE BERLIN: https://www.instagram.com/ecstaticdance.berlin/

messages.name: ecstaticdanceberlin
messages.content:
💃🏽 MOVEMENT WARM-UP AT:

ECSTATIC DANCE | YARUN DEE | 19 DEC

👉 JULIA JAVKIN (19-19:50): 

During the warm-up, we’ll explore each body’s unique language through movement, aiming to release what’s stored within and reconnect with life’s lightness. ✨ Together, we’ll let go of rigidity, embrace playfulness, and delve into self-exploration. 🌈

Julia Javkin has spent the past 15 years developing her artistic skills in dance, somatic practices, and martial arts. Based in Barcelona since 2019, Julia works across various fields related to mental health, particularly addiction, providing private consultations and leading movement therapy workshops in London, Barcelona and Berlin.

✅ CHECK FACEBOOK EVENT
👉 GET YOUR TICKET

📍 LOCATION: FMP1, Franz-Mehring-Platz, 10243 Berlin

🐾 FOLLOW ECSTATIC DANCE BERLIN: https://www.instagram.com/ecstaticdance.berlin/

messages.name: danfly1989
messages.content: FYI: Not quite a board game, but starting a new beginner friendly DnD campaign tomorrow evening at Harzer Straße if anyone is interested (Dragons of Stormwreck Isle). Module allows for up to 3 more places

messages.name: Dominik
messages.content: Which DnD edition ?

messages.name: danfly1989
messages.content: 5e. I don't think the Stormwreck module exists for any other edition, excluding homebrew stuff.

messages.name: Dominik
messages.content: I would be interested. At what time of the day ? I am a beginner, though I have played bg2 and bg3.

messages.name: danfly1989
messages.content: The BG night it is a part of starts at 18:00, though I expect we start 19:00 at the earliest. It is the the most beginner friendly module out there imo

messages.name: TrueMilli
messages.content:
If you're considering donating (more) this year, this would be a good week. "ovua" on reddit is doubling donations (no limit). You just need to post a screenshot of your donation here: https://www.reddit.com/r/mauerstrassenwetten/comments/1her0h7/
Effektiv Spenden confirms that the person donated the claimed amount last year: https://ea-germany.slack.com/archives/CGL0MDGPK/p1734341844717209

PS: The 3x might be a bit confusing, this is about an ongoing donation matching program on the subreddit for Deutsche Depressionshilfe. You don't need to participate in that to get matched by "ovua".

messages.name: Kinga
messages.content: Weißt Du, ob das für Spenden egal an wen gilt?

messages.name: Kinga
messages.content: Ah, alles klar, danke.

messages.name: TrueMilli
messages.content: It's unrestricted but ovua's matching "likely" goes to Effektiv Spenden.

messages.name: Kinga
messages.content: Ein paar Leute in meinem Umfeld könnten auf die Idee kommen, an eine (demokratische) Partei zu spenden. Würde auch das zählen?

messages.name: Kinga
messages.content: I don't

messages.name: TrueMilli
messages.content: Best ask there. Let me know if you don't have a reddit account and I'll ask for you.
